## üéÅ Contribute!

This community is what we decide to make it - so come and help us shape everything from our ethos and aims to our code and public image! Those who make significant contributions to the community can apply to show off this commitment to the world by becoming an NHS-R Community Fellow! You could contribute:

- To our [codebase](#code-contribution)
- To our [committee](#committee)
- By hosting or cohosting [training](#workshops)
- By creating training, a workshop or webinar
- By delivering a workshop or webinar 
- By writing a [blog](#blogs)
- By tidying up the automatically generated subtitles on our [YouTube videos](https://www.youtube.com/@NHSRCommunity)
- Helping redesign any of our assets (website, books, repositories for example)
- By representing the community to the outside world

To show our gratitude for your contributions, you can apply (or nominate someone) to become an [NHS-R Fellow](#fellow). This is a great way to receive recognition and publicise your involvement.
